articles.title: Greetings to Malawian President
articles.content:
Greetings to Malawian President
 Pyongyang, July 5 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, on Tuesday sent a message of greeting to Joyce Banda, president of Malawi, on the occasion of the 49th anniversary of its independence.
					 The message wished the president and people of Malawi success in their efforts for the development and prosperity of the country, expressing belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would continue growing.

articles.title: Greetings to Comoros President
articles.content:
Greetings to Comoros President
 Pyongyang, July 5 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, Tuesday sent a message of greeting to Ikililou Dhoinine, president of Comoros, on the occasion of the 38th anniversary of its independence.
					 The message wished the president and people of Comoros success in their work for the stability and socio-economic development of the country, expressing belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would grow stronger.

articles.title: Message of Greeting to Venezuelan President
articles.content:
Message of Greeting to Venezuelan President
						
 Pyongyang, July 5 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, Friday sent a message of greeting to Nicolas Maduro Moros, president of Venezuela, on the occasion of its independence day.
					 Expressing belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would continue developing on good terms in the future, too, the message sincerely wished the president of Venezuela bigger successes in his responsible work to put an end to all interference in the country's internal affairs, defend national independence and sovereignty and achieve the political stability of the country.

articles.title: Greetings to Venezuelan FM
articles.content:
Greetings to Venezuelan FM
 Pyongyang, July 5 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Pak Ui Chun on Friday sent a message of greeting to Elias Jaua Milano, foreign minister of Venezuela, on the occasion of its independence day.
					 The message wished the Venezuelan foreign minister bigger successes in his work, expressing belief that the excellent relations of friendship and cooperation between the two countries would grow stronger day by day in line with the interests of the two governments and peoples.

articles.title: Talks Held between First Vice Foreign Ministers of DPRK, Russia
articles.content:
Talks Held between First Vice Foreign Ministers of DPRK, Russia
						
 Moscow, July 5 (KCNA) -- Talks were held in Moscow Thursday between Kim Kye Gwan, first vice minister of Foreign Affairs of the DPRK and Vladimir Titov, first vice foreign minister of the Russian Federation.
					 Present there from the DPRK side were the party of the first vice foreign minister and Kim Yong Jae, DPRK ambassador to Russia, and from the Russian side officials concerned.
					
					 The two sides exchanged views on the issue of boosting the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries and other matters of mutual concern.
					
					 The talks proceeded in a sincere and friendly atmosphere.
					
					 That day the first vice foreign minister of the DPRK had talks with Igor Morgulov, vice foreign minister of Russia.

articles.title: Choe Ryong Hae Makes Field Survey of Sepho Tableland Reclamation
articles.content:
Choe Ryong Hae Makes Field Survey of Sepho Tableland Reclamation 
						
 Pyongyang, July 5 (KCNA) -- Choe Ryong Hae, director of the General Political Bureau of the Korean People's Army (KPA), made a field survey of the reclamation of the Sepho tableland.
					 Going round Rimok-ri and Hyon-ri of Sepho County, Kangwon Province, he acquainted himself with the manuring and cultivation of artificial grassland and fodder grass created and planted by KPA soldiers and learnt in detail about their living.
					
					 It is the intention of Supreme Commander Kim Jong Un to turn the Sepho tableland into a large-scale stockbreeding base helpful to the improvement of people's living standard, the director noted, underscoring the need for the KPA soldiers to take the lead in the campaign for creating the speed on Sepho tableland to materialize the intention.
					
					 He also stressed the need to construct modern buildings at the stockbreeding base as intended by the Workers' Party of Korea and as required by the topographical conditions and carry out the work of creating grassland under a long-term plan.
					
					 The commanding officers should intensify the political and ideological education of soldiers and take warm care of their living as their real brothers and sisters would do, he stressed.

articles.title: Press Release of June 15 All-Korean Committee
articles.content:
Press Release of June 15 All-Korean Committee 
						
 Pyongyang, July 5 (KCNA) -- A meeting of the chairmen of the north, south and overseas sides committees for implementation of June 15 Joint Declaration (June 15 All-Korean Committee) was held in Beijing from July 4 to 5 to mark the 41st anniversary of the historic July 4 joint statement.
					 A press release was published on July 4.
					
					 According to it, it was confirmed once again at the meeting that the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration serve as a basic principle of national reunification and a landmark common to the nation all the Koreans should invariably uphold till the day of national reunification.
					
					 The meeting agreed upon that the implementation of the joint declarations is the only way for mending the north-south ties and achieving the country's peace and reunification.
					
					 June 15 All-Korean Committee agreed to invariably uphold the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration as the banner of national reunification on the principle of independently solving the issue of the country's reunification.
					
					 It agreed to hold joint national events in Kaesong on the occasion of the 68th anniversary of Korea's liberation and on the occasion of the October 4 declaration and the Foundation Day of Korea with the attendance of all political parties, organizations and figures of various social standings desirous of national reconciliation and reunification.
					
					 It agreed to reopen the way of exchange and cooperation among people from all walks of life.
					
					 It agreed to make various efforts including a seminar on peace and reunification on the Korean Peninsula to this end on the occasion of the 60th anniversary of the Armistice Agreement this year.
					
					 Welcoming the offer made by the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea on June 6 in which it proposed the talks between the authorities of the north and the south and called for boosting humanitarian and cooperation undertakings such as the normalization of the operation of the Kaesong Industrial Zone, the resumption of tours to Mt. Kumgang and the reunion of separated families and their relatives, the Committee agreed to make concrete discussions as for the offer made by the south side committee to push forward various NGO-level undertakings.
					
					 The Committee agreed to actively push forward diverse solidarity activities and joint struggle to oppose Japan's distortion of history, its moves to seize Tok Islets and evade the crimes related to the sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army as well as the discrimination and politically-motivated suppression of Koreans in Japan.
					
					 It agreed to make necessary efforts to arrange the talks between the authorities for the resumption of tours to Mt. Kumgang and the reunion of separated families and their relatives and thus advance the relations between the authorities with the talks between the authorities of the north and the south slated for July 6 as a momentum.
					
					 It agreed to press ahead with diverse solidarity activities for national reconciliation, unity and reunification including the regular meeting of the chairmen to further solidarity and unity.

articles.title: Captains Regent of San Marino Voice Will to Boost Relations with DPRK
articles.content:
Captains Regent of San Marino Voice Will to Boost Relations with DPRK
						
 Pyongyang, July 5 (KCNA) -- Kim Chun Guk, DPRK ambassador to San Marino, presented his credentials to Captains Regent of San Marino Antonella Mularoni and Denis Amici on June 26.
					 They expressed the will to develop the bilateral relations in all fields to meet the interests of the peoples of the two countries.

articles.title: Delegation of Youth League Back Home
articles.content:
Delegation of Youth League Back Home
						
 Pyongyang, July 5 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League led by Jong Yong Won, vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the league, returned home on Friday by train after taking part in the second international preparatory meeting for the 18th World Festival of Youth and Students and the meeting of the General Council of the World Federation of Democratic Youth held in Spain.

articles.title: Floral Tribute to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il by Staff Members of International Bodies
articles.content:
Floral Tribute to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il by Staff Members of International Bodies
						
 Pyongyang, July 5 (KCNA) -- Staff members of international bodies here Friday visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill Friday on the occasion of the 19th anniversary of demise of the President. They are missions of the WFP, WHO, FAO of the UN and UNDP.
					 They placed floral baskets before the statues and paid tribute.

articles.title: Remembrance Meeting of Foreign Crewmen Held
articles.content:
Remembrance Meeting of Foreign Crewmen Held
						
 Pyongyang, July 5 (KCNA) -- A remembrance meeting of foreign crewmen took place at Hungnam Port Friday on the occasion of the 19th anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung.
					 They laid bunches of flowers before the statues of Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il in Hamhung City, South Hamgyong Province and paid tribute to them.
					
					 At the meeting speakers said that the President embarked on the road of the revolution in his early years, founded the immortal Juche idea and led the revolution and construction to victory. His whole life was the shining one totally dedicated to the country, people and humankind, they noted, adding:
					
					 The President, the most outstanding leader and legendary great man in the 20th century, performed immortal feats before the era and the history with his iron will, matchless pluck and noble personality.
					
					 He will always be alive in the hearts of not only the Korean people but progressives.
					
					 The revolutionary cause of Juche pioneered by him will be successfully accomplished by the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The speakers extended full support and solidarity to the Korean people in their drive to accelerate the building of a thriving nation, rallied close around Kim Jong Un.
					
					 A letter to him was adopted at the meeting.
					
					 Present at the meeting were the captain and crewmen of a Panamanian-flagged ship.

articles.title: Remembrance Concert Given by Agricultural Workers
articles.content:
Remembrance Concert Given by Agricultural Workers
						
 Pyongyang, July 5 (KCNA) -- A remembrance concert "We will uphold our party with increased production of rice, true to behests of the fatherly leader" was given by agricultural workers at the Samjigang Cooperative Farm in Jaeryong County, South Hwanghae Province on Friday on the occasion of the 19th anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Among the performers were members of the art squad of the C.C., the Union of Agricultural Workers of Korea and agricultural workers of the farm.
					
					 The concert began with poem-reciting and chorus "The Eternal Smile". Put on the stage were female trio "The Leader Is without Parallel in the World", trombone solo and pangchang "Oh, the Unforgettable Dawn when the Leader Received Us", female solo and pangchang "When We Walk along Lane Through Fields" and other numbers.
					
					 The performers truthfully represented the ardent longing for the President, who provided ceaseless on-the-spot guidance for the prosperity of the country and happiness of its people despite cold wind, snow and rain.
					
					 Male quartet "Highest Honor in Life", female solo "Let Korea Advance for Implementation of the New Line" and other numbers reflected the honor and happiness of the Korean people blessed with the illustrious leaders generation after generation as they are holding the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un in high esteem and the deep trust in the Workers' Party of Korea which has the dignity of the great Paektusan nation demonstrated before the world.

articles.title: Remembrance Meeting of Youth, Students Held
articles.content:
Remembrance Meeting of Youth, Students Held
						
 Pyongyang, July 5 (KCNA) -- A remembrance meeting of youth and students "Everlasting embrace of the sun" was held at the Central Youth Hall Friday on the occasion of the 19th anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung.
					 At the meeting which began with immortal revolutionary hymn "Song of General Kim Il Sung" the performers recollected with deep emotion the revolutionary career of the President, who dedicated his all to the prosperity of the country, happiness of the people and rosy future of the rising generation.
					
					 Jon Yong Nam, chairman of the Central Committee of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League, said the President set forth the unique idea and theory on the Juche-oriented youth movement and pursued the politics giving priority to the youth and thus led the Korean youth movement to victory.
					
					 The participants were mesmerized by the stories told by Ku Ok Sun residing in Somun-dong, Central District and others who had the honor of being received by the President and Kim Kwang Chol, a teacher of the Mangyongdae Schoolchildren's Palace, and Pae Hye Nam, a teacher of Kumsong School who had the privilege of singing songs in the presence of the President.
					
					 Pak Song Chol, vice-chairman of the youth league committee of Kim Il Sung University, and Pak Yong Gum, a teacher of Ryongwang Senior Secondary School in Central District, said the exploits the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il performed for the rising generation would shine forever as they worked heart and soul to bring up the youth and students to be talents who would shoulder upon themselves the future of Songun Korea.
					
					 When songs "The face of the leader beamed with a broad smile" and "The Marshal has made a long trip" resounded forth in the hall, all the participants were overcome with ardent yearning and boundless reverence for him.
					
					 Pak Song Min, chief of staff of the 3rd battalion of the youth shock brigade of the Ministry of Railways, said that the care of the dear respected Kim Jong Un is like the cradle of eternal life.
					
					 Cha Hyong Jin, manager of the Pyongyang City Myohyangsan Mountaineering Children's Camp, referred to the noble personality of Marshal Kim Jong Un who has taken warm care of school youth and children. 
					
					 The performers reiterated their will to eternally hold the Generalissimos in high esteem and fully demonstrate the spirit of the young vanguard in the Songun era under the leadership of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Preparations for "Arirang" Performance Close to End in DPRK
articles.content:
Preparations for "Arirang" Performance Close to End in DPRK
						
 Pyongyang, July 5 (KCNA) -- The grand gymnastic and artistic performance "Arirang", a winner of Kim Il Sung Prize, will be given here as part of galas to mark the 65th birthday of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea and the 60th anniversary of the Korean people's victory in the Fatherland Liberation War (June 25, 1950-July 27, 1953).
					 In this regard, KCNA met Kim Kum Ryong, chief director of the state preparatory committee for the performance.
					
					 Kim said:
					
					 Preparations for the "Arirang" performance are in full swing at the final stage.
					
					 The performance, given annually for ten odd years, is the greatest masterpiece ever in the world's history of art performances as it involves Korea's famous songs, folk dances, rhythmic gymnastics and acrobatics, supported by amazing background stand, large stage settings and illuminators.
					
					 The upcoming performance will focus on the undying feats President Kim Il Sung performed in winning the Fatherland Liberation War against the U.S. imperialist aggressors who boasted of being "the strongest" in the world.
					
					 It will also feature the feats performed by leader Kim Jong Il to turn the DPRK into a satellite manufacturing and launching state and a nuclear state as well as the achievements scored in the country under the leadership of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 Many parts of the performance have been amended in content and style.
					
					 All creators and performers are now working hard to make a great hit.
					
					 The performance will begin at May Day Stadium on July 22.

articles.title: Germ Warfare Perpetrated by U.S. in Korean War
articles.content:
Germ Warfare Perpetrated by U.S. in Korean War
						
 Pyongyang, July 5 (KCNA) -- As the U.S. suffered a series of defeats on all fronts in the Korean War (June 25, 1950-July 27, 1953), it launched a germ warfare in the territory of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, disregarding international law.
					 From mid-December 1950 to January 1951, the U.S. imperialist aggressors spread such contagious germs as smallpox virus in the areas of Pyongyang City and Kangwon and Hwanghae provinces, leaving thousands of people infected with the virus and many of them dead until April 1951.
					
					 The warfare went into full swing in early 1952. The U.S. warplanes dropped germ bombs and virus-contaminated things on 400 odd sites in the DPRK more than 700 times from the end of January to the end of March.
					
					 At that time, various species of insects, including flies, were found in southeastern area of Ichon County, which were confirmed to be infected with cholera virus.
					
					 Besides, strange species of flies, fleas, spiders, beetles, bedbugs, crickets and mosquitoes were found alive in such areas as Pyongyang City and Yangdok and Kowon counties, all of which carried viruses of acute cholera, pest, typhoid, paratyphoid and dysentery.
					
					 The facts, verified by the field survey team of the International Association of Democratic Lawyers during the war, show that the U.S. employed every conceivable means in killing people in the DPRK.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Ushering in New Age of Development of Science, Technology
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Ushering in New Age of Development of Science, Technology
 Pyongyang, July 5 (KCNA) -- The scientific and technological front is the outpost of the party-wide and all-people general offensive to implement the new line of the Workers' Party of Korea on simultaneously pushing forward economic construction and the building of nuclear force, says Rodong Sinmun in an editorial Friday.
					 It goes on:
					
					 The WPK's line is premised on the rapid development of science and technology and no success can be achieved in economic construction and the building of nuclear force without the development of science and technology.
					
					 Under the wise leadership of the great Generalissimos Kim Il 
					
					Sung and Kim Jong Il, who always attached importance to science and technology, the nation witnessed the development of fields of latest science and technology, core forces for research and development have grown up and foundations have been laid for the development of the cutting-edge industry.
					
					 In various economic sectors, the work to put them on a Juche, modern and CNC basis made dynamic progress. The DPRK's space, nuclear and CNC technologies, in particular, have been put on a world level despite the U.S. imperialists and their allies' persistent moves to stifle the DPRK.
					
					 The shortest cut to achieving the prosperity of the nation lies in strictly relying on science and technology and steadily developing them.
					
					 The development of science and technology accelerates the development of all the sectors and the development level and speed of all fabrics of society are decided by the progress of science and technology. Under this situation, the issue of bringing about signal progress in science and technology is presenting itself as a more urgent task for the successful implementation of the WPK's new line.
					
					 Success in the work to develop science and technology entirely hinges on how our officials, commanding members of the revolution, work as is the case with all other affairs.
					
					 The editorial calls upon all the officials to pay deep attention to science and technology and make all efforts for their development.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Marks Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Work
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Marks Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Work
						
 Pyongyang, July 5 (KCNA) -- Today marks the 12th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's work "Songun Politics of Our Party Is an Effective Socialist Political Mode". 
					 This work clarifies the idea that the Songun politics of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) is the most revolutionary and effective socialist political mode from the principle of making a revolution with arms and practical experience of the Korean revolution. 
					
					 Rodong Sinmun Friday dedicates an article to this anniversary, saying that the work serves as immortal guidelines indicating the most correct way of glorifying the sacred history and tradition of the Korean revolution which was pioneered and has made victorious progress  by dint of arms and accomplishing the socialist cause of Juche.
					
					 Since the publication of the work Korean style socialism has covered a road of victory under the Songun leadership of the great party, the article says, and goes on:
					
					 During the period the ideological unity of the revolutionary ranks has been achieved at a high level and the Korean People's Army has developed into the invincible revolutionary Paektusan army and won one victory after another in the struggle to defend socialism. 
					
					 The DPRK is now dynamically advancing for a final victory after emerging an invincible political and ideological power and socialist bulwark with matchless military muscle and strong national economic potential. This is a shining product of the great Songun politics of the WPK. 
					
					 Korean style socialism centered on the popular masses is sure to win victory thanks to the great revolutionary exploits of Kim Jong Il, who devoted himself to the Songun revolution for the prosperity of the country and happiness of its people. 
					
					 The Songun politics of the WPK is the eternal lifeline of Korean style socialism and powerful treasured sword for a final victory.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Accuses U.S. of Its Attempt to Turn "UN Command" into Multi-national Coalition Body
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Accuses U.S. of Its Attempt to Turn "UN Command" into Multi-national Coalition Body
						
 Pyongyang, July 5 (KCNA) -- The U.S. is now working hard to turn the "UN Command" into a multi-national coalition mechanism in a bid to use it as a mother body of NATO of Asian version.
					 Rodong Sinmun on Friday observes in a bylined article in this regard:
					
					 The U.S. new defense strategy published in January 2012 is aimed at laying a siege to other power in Asia and containing it by force of arms so that it may not stand up against the U.S.
					
					 It is the ulterior intention of the U.S. to prefer forming such allied forces in such a crafty way as reviving the role of the command which exists in name only to creating a new body in order to calm down the rebuff of countries concerned.
					
					 It is another strategic calculation of the U.S. to keep a firm grip on south Korea as an advanced base and servant for a war of aggression for dominating the Asia-Pacific region by reviving the function of the command under the rapidly changing situation.
					
					 What merits particular attention is that the command is nothing but a tool for igniting the second Korean War.
					
					 Having transferred its military and strategic pivot to the Asia-Pacific region to dominate the world, the U.S. regards it as a primary target to put the whole of Korea under its control in order to secure a bridgehead to advance into Eurasia. And it is seeking a way out of its serious economic crisis in unleashing the second Korean War.
					
					 To  dismantle the command at once or not serves as a touchstone showing whether the U.S. wants peace and stability on the Korean Peninsula and in the Asia-Pacific region or not, or whether it seeks the revival of the Cold War or not.
					
					 The article demands an immediate disbandment of the command, a U.S. tool for provoking a war on the peninsula, the worst flashpoint in the world.

articles.title: Papers Slam S. Korean Chief Executive for Depending on Outside Forces
articles.content:
Papers Slam S. Korean Chief Executive for Depending on Outside Forces 
						
 Pyongyang, July 5 (KCNA) -- The south Korean authorities are now talkative about "dialogue" and "confidence-building" but, in fact, they are busy visiting foreign countries to beg for cooperation in the anti-DPRK campaign, while stepping up their moves to hurt compatriots in collusion with outside forces. 
					 Newspapers of the DPRK Friday run articles denouncing this. 
					
					 Rodong Sinmun says in a bylined article:
					
					 The south Korean authorities are clinging to coattails of foreign forces to persistently hype the "nuclear issue of the north."  This is nothing but a traitorous move to stifle fellow countrymen in collusion with outside forces.
					
					 The north and the south should take the stand of national independence in order to defuse distrust and confrontation and take the road of peace and reunification. 
					
					 Strengthening cooperation with outsiders in disregard of national independence would never help solve the issue of the destiny of the nation. 
					
					 Much upset by the might of the DPRK growing stronger day by day and the mounting desire of the south Korean people for improving the north-south relations and achieving national reconciliation and unity, the south Korean puppet authorities are working hard to tarnish the image of the DPRK at any cost and escalate the confrontation with compatriots. 
					
					 They sought a way out of their predicament in depending on outside forces and boosting cooperation with them in the anti-DPRK campaign. 
					
					 They should know clearly that what they do at present going against the trend of the times towards national independence would only invite curse and condemnation from all Koreans and precipitate their destruction. 
					
					 If they truly want north-south dialogue, improved relations and peace and denuclearization of the Korean Peninsula, they should stop relying on outsiders and take the stand of national independence. 
					
					 Minju Joson in a bylined commentary says that the nation will never tolerate Park Geun Hye's provocative remarks against the DPRK at a time when people are becoming more vocal demanding the improved relations between the north and the south and defusing of tensions on the Korean Peninsula.

articles.title: S. Korean Puppet Forces Slammed for Putting KIZ in Crisis
articles.content:
S. Korean Puppet Forces Slammed for Putting KIZ in Crisis 
						
 Pyongyang, July 5 (KCNA) -- The South Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification released a commentary on Wednesday denouncing the puppet forces of south Korea for putting the Kaesong Industrial Zone (KIZ) in a crisis.
					 It is almost three months since the operation in the KIZ was suspended, the commentary recalled.
					
					 It is none other than the present "government" which sparked the crisis in the KIZ, it said, adding: This crisis was caused by its moves escalate the confrontation with fellow countrymen, opposed to national reconciliation and co-prosperity, it said.
					
					 It slammed the south Korean authorities for deliberately aborting even the talks between authorities of the south and the north, a gold opportunity for normalizing the operation in the KIZ.
					
					 It urged the authorities to immediately allow those who have businesses in the KIZ to visit the area.
					
					 If the "government" makes the KIZ, a precious achievement of the June 15 joint declaration, a victim of the moves for war and confrontation, it will not be able to escape condemnation by the nation, the commentary warned.

articles.title: S. Korean Warmongers Plan to Hurl Civilians into Special Warfare Drill
articles.content:
S. Korean Warmongers Plan to Hurl Civilians into Special Warfare Drill
						
 Pyongyang, July 5 (KCNA) -- The special warfare brigade of the south Korean puppet Navy is planning to hurl students and civilians into a special warfare drill in the area of the Jinhae naval base for five days from July 29, according to KBS of south Korea.
					 The warmongers are mulling selecting 120 students of high schools and universities and civilians to give them the anti-DPRK education and let them watch a special warfare drill. They, at the same time, plan such military training for them as landing drill and mobile exercise by fast patrol boats.
					
					 This is a clear indication of the evermore reckless actions of the warmongers to train them as canon fodder of the U.S. imperialists in military confrontation with the DPRK.

articles.title: Stop to Illegal Construction of Jeju Naval Base Demanded
articles.content:
Stop to Illegal Construction of Jeju Naval Base Demanded
						
 Pyongyang, July 5 (KCNA) -- South Korean civic organizations including the Kangjong Village Society and the Measure Council for Checking the Construction of Jeju Naval Base held a press conference on Jeju Island on July 2.
					 They demanded the puppet authorities stop the project.
					
					 Speakers accused the military authorities of seriously contaminating waters off the village where the illegal construction of the naval base is going on.
					
					 When two inhabitants made their ways into the construction site in protest against environmental pollution, the military authorities arrested them on charges of "disturbing the project", they charged.
					
					 They urged the military authorities to discontinue the project and stop suppressing the protestors.

articles.title: South Korean Regime Slammed for Opening Minutes of North-South Summit to Public
articles.content:
South Korean Regime Slammed for Opening Minutes of North-South Summit to Public 
 Pyongyang, July 5 (KCNA) -- The south Korean council of organizations for the  preservation of records held a meeting in Seoul on July 2 accusing the puppet Intelligence Service (IS) of opening the minutes of the north-south summit to public, according to CBS of south Korea.
					 At the meeting the council said it was obviously an action against the law that the IS opened to public the minutes of the south-north summit in 2007, one of "the presidential documents."
					
					  The present chief executive should call the IS into question for the case, held the council.

articles.title: Self-Resignation of S. Korean Chief Executive Demanded
articles.content:
Self-Resignation of S. Korean Chief Executive Demanded
						
 Pyongyang, July 5 (KCNA) -- An editor of Minjok Thongsin, an internet newspaper of Koreans in the U.S., on June 28 issued an article demanding the south Korean puppet chief executive step down by herself.
					 South Koreans are becoming increasingly vocal demanding the chief executive step down, the article said, and went on:
					
					 A lot of frauds as regards Park Geun Hye's election were disclosed right after the election, and civic and public organizations complained even to the UN about this issue.
					
					  Park, in fact, cannot claim to be "president" before the truth about the case is probed. But she has unilaterally acted as "president" in disregard of the demand of the people by taking advantage of the "Saenuri Party" and the Intelligence Service (IS).
					
					 It is necessary to thoroughly probe the truth about the IS's interference in the election, punish those concerned and declare Park's election invalid. Worse still, if such illegal action was taken by her instruction, she should be sternly punished.
					
					 Nevertheless, if she insists on staying in the "presidential office", her election should be declared invalid by the judgment of the people.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Remembered in Various Countries
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Remembered in Various Countries
						
 Pyongyang, July 5 (KCNA) -- Remembrance meetings were held in Germany, Switzerland and Austria on June 28 and 29 to commemorate the 19th anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung.
					 On display in the venues of meetings were photos documenting the undying feats of the President, leader Kim Jong Il and the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Displayed there were works of the peerlessly great persons of Mt. Paektu and books introducing Songun Korea.
					
					 Torsten Schoevitz, acting chairman of the Communist Party of Germany, said:
					
					 The President defeated U.S. and Japanese imperialisms, achieved the freedom and liberation of Korea and firmly defended them.
					
					 His cause was successfully carried forward by Kim Jong Il. Kim Jong Un is now carrying forward it.
					
					 Martin Lotscher, chairman of the Switzerland-Korea Committee, said that Kim Il Sung was the great leader of the Korean nation who smashed the moves of the U.S. and Japanese imperialists to stamp out the Korean history and culture spanning 5 000 years and worked heart and soul to add shine to the country's precious cultural treasures.
					
					 Speakers including Eduard Knarf, chairman of the Society for the Promotion of the Relations between Austria and DPRK, highly praised the President as invincible and iron-willed commander who defeated U.S and Japanese imperialisms, great master of leadership who turned the DPRK into an invincible socialist power and elder statesman recognized by the world.
					
					 Messages to Kim Jong Un were adopted at the meetings.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Feats Performed in Winning Victory in War Praised in Various Countries
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Feats Performed in Winning Victory in War Praised in Various Countries
 Pyongyang, July 5 (KCNA) -- Meetings were held in France, the Czech Republic and Bulgaria and round-table talks in Germany on June 27 and 29 to mark the 60th anniversary of the Korean people's victory in the great Fatherland Liberation War.
					 On display in the venues of the events were photos documenting immortal exploits of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Guy Dupre, secretary general of the International Liaison Committee for Reunification and Peace in Korea who is delegate president of the France-Korea Friendship Association, said that July 27 is the historic day marking the 60th anniversary of the Korean people's victory in the great Fatherland Liberation War under the leadership of the President Kim Il Sung. He went on:
					
					 I pay the highest tribute to Kim Il Sung, who led the war fought to beat back the U.S. imperialists' aggression to victory, and Kim Jong Il, who foiled moves of the imperialist allied forces to stifle the DPRK by dint of Songun politics and firmly defended its sovereignty and dignity.
					
					 The world peace-loving forces are voicing full support for the Korean people in their just cause of resolutely struggling against the hostile policy toward the DPRK and the moves of the U.S.-led imperialist allied forces to start a nuclear war. 
					
					 Miroslav Stepan, general secretary of the Central Committee of the Czechoslovak Communist Party, said that the Korean people's victory in the Fatherland Liberation War proved the fact that no force on earth can overpower the might of the people who turned out in the struggle to defend the country under the leadership of the great leader and marked a historic event which shattered the myth of the "mightiness" of the U.S. for the first time in history.
					
					 Atanas Ivanov, honorary chairman of the Bulgarian Communists Union, praised Kim Il Sung, invincible and iron-willed commander, for leading the hard-fought three-year-long Fatherland Liberation War to victory with his unique strategy, tactics and war methods.
					
					 A congratulatory message to Kim Jong Un was adopted at the meeting held in Bulgaria.

articles.title: Beninese Political Figure Censures U.S. for Starting Korean War
articles.content:
Beninese Political Figure Censures U.S. for Starting Korean War
						
 Pyongyang, July 5 (KCNA) -- Ali Houdou, chairman of the Benin Socialist Party, released a statement on June 25 to mark the beginning of the June 25-July 27 month of anti-U.S. joint struggle.
					 He recalled that the U.S., architect of the division of Korea, exerted all efforts for igniting the Korean war in a bid to put the whole of Korea under its control. 
					
					 He cited facts to prove that the U.S. made thorough preparations for a war by mobilizing huge forces and combat equipment and instigated south Korea to perpetrate ceaseless armed provocations which eventually led to the start of the Korean war. It is an irrefutable historical fact that the U.S. ignited the Korean war more than six decades ago and it cannot evade responsibility for it, he noted, and continued:
					
					 It is the consistent policy of the U.S. to invade socialist Korea and expand the sphere of its domination. 
					
					 The recent U.S.-south Korea joint military drills and exercises of U.S. latest nuclear striking means staged on the Korean Peninsula and in its vicinity indicate that the outbreak of a nuclear war by the U.S. is becoming an established fact.
					
					 All members of the Benin Socialist Party once again voice support and firm solidarity for the Korean people in their just cause of protecting the sovereignty of the country and building a thriving socialist nation.

articles.title: Korean People's Struggle to Protect Their Sovereignty Supported by Nigerian Organization
articles.content:
Korean People's Struggle to Protect Their Sovereignty Supported by Nigerian Organization
 Pyongyang, July 5 (KCNA) -- The Nigerian National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea posted articles on its website on June 26 and 28 to mark the 60th anniversary of the Korean people's victory in the great Fatherland Liberation War.
					 An article titled "Battle for liberating Taejon" said:
					
					 The DPRK worked many military miracles in the Korean war by which the myth of the "mightiness" of the U.S. was shattered.
					
					 The battle in Taejon, a typical example of modern siege warfare, draws keen attention from world strategists.
					
					 President Kim Il Sung led the battle to victory with his superb war method which no one could ever conceive. It was a unique war method that he made sure that the KPA completely encircled and wiped out a huge group of the enemy through a combination of a fierce frontal attack and prompt bypass movement. 
					
					 The article "Justice is sure to triumph" introduced bold countermeasures taken by the DPRK such as the third underground nuclear test for coping with the U.S. and its allied forces' undisguised moves to stifle it over its satellite launch for peaceful purposes, adding:
					
					 The DPRK's nuclear deterrence serves as a means for legitimate self-defence which it was compelled to acquire to cope with the U.S. increased hostile policy and nuclear threat and a just treasured sword for defending the sovereignty of the country and nation, peace and security.
					
					 It is the DPRK's resolute decision and will to root out the source of evil, the U.S.
					
					 The world people aspiring after justice and progress are supporting the Korean people standing firm against the U.S. and its followers keen on highhanded and arbitrary practices.
					
					 Victory is in store for the justice and the Korean people all out in the struggle to defend their sovereignty.

articles.title: WFDY General Council Supports Korean People
articles.content:
WFDY General Council Supports Korean People
						
 Pyongyang, July 5 (KCNA) -- A meeting of the General Council of the World Federation of Democratic Youth (WFDY) took place in Madrid, Spain on June 27.
					 The meeting reviewed its work last year, discussed the orientation of its future activities and adopted a political resolution.
					
					 At the meeting speakers denounced the imperialists for their desperate aggression moves in various places of the world, calling on youth organizations of all countries to intensify anti-imperialist struggle in unity.
					
					 Vehemently condemning the U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK, they appealed to the people to extend support and solidarity to the Korean people in their just cause for the independent and peaceful reunification of the country.
					
					 The meeting adopted a statement of the WFDY for averting a nuclear war and achieving durable peace and reunification on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 The statement said that the toughest measures taken by the DPRK to frustrate the U.S. imperialists' reckless nuclear war scenario are just ones for ensuring peace of the peninsula and regional stability.
					
					 Bitterly denouncing the hostile policy of the U.S., source of nuclear crisis on the Korean Peninsula, the statement strongly demanded the U.S. and its followers stop reckless nuclear war racket against the DPRK, and the U.S. immediately withdraw all its nuclear war equipment from south Korea so as to establish durable peace mechanism.
					
					 It urged the south Korean authorities to give up their anti-north war moves and confrontation racket against reunification which would cause the second Korean war, reject foreign forces and mend the inter-Korean relations under the banner of the June 15 joint declaration and come out for national reconciliation, unity and reunification.
					
					 It called on all progressive youth organizations in the world to actively join the Korean people in their effort to replace the Armistice Agreement by a peace treaty this year which marks the 60th anniversary of their victory in the great Fatherland Liberation War.
					
					 It expressed invariable support and solidarity for the people and youth of the DPRK in their just struggle to build a prosperous socialist power and achieve the country's reunification by  concerted efforts of the nation under the guidance of the dear respected Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: International Solidarity Meeting in Spain Supports DPRK
articles.content:
International Solidarity Meeting in Spain Supports DPRK
						
 Pyongyang, July 5 (KCNA) -- An international solidarity meeting for supporting young people's struggle against imperialism took place in Madrid, Spain on June 28.
					 The speakers at the meeting referred to the fact that the imperialists have become all the more undisguised in their moves of aggression, war, domination and interference, sanctions and blockade against sovereign countries.
					
					 They called for marking the 18th World Festival of Youth and Students as an important occasion of demonstrating the united strength of youth desirous of independence against imperialism.
					
					 The meeting adopted an appeal "Let's extend support and solidarity to the Korean youth and other people in their just struggle".
					
					 The appeal noted that the acute nuclear crisis on the Korean Peninsula is attributable to the hostile policy towards the DPRK with which the U.S. has been present in south Korea for almost 70 years while working hard to stifle the DPRK.
					
					 It called for launching an international media campaign to vehemently condemn the U.S. and south Korean bellicose forces for their hostile policies and nuclear war moves endangering peace and security in the Korean Peninsula and the rest of the world and having the U.S. troops withdrawn from south Korea immediately.
					
					 It urged to raise voices of solidarity with the Koreans' efforts to establish durable peace mechanism on the peninsula with the approach of the 60th anniversary of their victory in the great Fatherland Liberation War.
					
					 It appealed to extend full support and encouragement to the Korean people's struggle to check and foil the U.S. and south Korean authorities' vicious war moves and confrontation racket against national reunification and open the gate to national reunification in unity under the banner of June 15 joint declaration.
					
					 The peace and security in the Korean Peninsula and the rest of the world would be creditably guaranteed only when the progressive youth and student organizations pool efforts with the Korean youth and other people in their just struggle, the appeal stressed.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam felicita a presidente venezolano
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam felicita a presidente venezolano
						
Pyongyang, 5 de julio (ACNC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, envio el dia 5 un mensaje de felicitacion al presidente de la Republica Bolivariana de Venezuela, Nicolas Maduro Moros, con motivo del dia de la independencia de este pais latinoamericano.
					  En su misiva el remitente expresa la conviccion de que las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion existentes en los dos paises seguiran desarrollandose favorablemente tambien en futuro.
					
					  Desea de todo corazon al destinatario mayores exitos en su trabajo responsable para acabar con las maniobras de intervencion en los asuntos internos de toda indole, defender la soberania y la independencia nacional y lograr la estabilidad politica del pais.

articles.title: Pak Ui Chun envia mensaje a su homologo venezolano
articles.content:
Pak Ui Chun envia mensaje a su homologo venezolano
						
Pyongyang, 5 de julio (ACNC) -- El ministro de Relaciones Exteriores de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Pak Ui Chun, envio el dia 5 un mensaje de felicitacion a su homologo venezolano, Elias Jaua Milano, con motivo del dia de independencia de Venezuela.
					  En su misiva, el remitente expresa la conviccion de que las excelentes relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre los dos paises se fortaleceran y se desarrollaran cada dia mas conforme a los intereses de los gobiernos y pueblos de ambos paises y desea al destinatario mayores exitos en su trabajo.

articles.title: Kim Kye Gwan departe con su homologo ruso
articles.content:
Kim Kye Gwan departe con su homologo ruso
						
Moscu, 5 de julio (ACNC) -- Tuvieron lugar el dia 4 en esta capital las conversaciones entre el primer vicecanciller coreano Kim Kye Gwan y su par ruso Vladimir Titov.
					En la ocasion participaron por la parte coreana la comitiva del primer vicecanciller y el embajador coreano en Rusia Kim Yong Jae y por la rusa, los funcionarios interesados.
					
					Ambas partes intercambiaron criterios sobre el mayor desarrollo de relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre los dos paises y otros asuntos de interes mutuo.
					
					Las conversaciones transcurrieron en un ambiente sincero y amistoso.
					
					Por otra parte, Kim sostuvo conversaciones con el vicecanciller ruso Igor Morgulov.

articles.title: Choe Ryong Hae recorre la meseta de Sepho
articles.content:
Choe Ryong Hae recorre la meseta de Sepho
						
Pyongyang, 5 de julio (ACNC) -- Choe Ryong Hae, jefe de la Direccion Politica General del Ejercito Popular de Corea, visito el lugar de roturacion de la meseta de Sepho.
					  Recorriendo las comunas de Rimok y Hyon del distrito de Sepho de la provincia de Kangwon, Choe averiguo el estado de herbazales artificiales creados por los militares del EPC y las condiciones de vida de estos.
					
					  Dijo que el Comandante Supremo tiene el proposito de convertir la meseta en la base ganadera de gran tamano que contribuya a la mejora de la vida del pueblo y subrayo que para ponerlo en practica, los uniformados deben ponerse a la cabeza de la campana de creacion de la velocidad de la meseta de Sepho.
					
					  Destaco la necesidad de construir modernamente los edificios de base ganadera conforme al proposito del Partido y a la peculiaridad topografica e impulsar con vistas al futuro la creacion de pastizal.
					
					  Prosiguio que los oficiales tienen que intensificar la educacion politico-ideologica y atender con fraternidad la vida de soldados.
